text.__SUMMARY__:
Albizia guillainii is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found only in New Caledonia.
It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.References: Hequet, V. (2010). "Albizia guillainii". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 2010: e.T35026A9906081. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.2010-4.RLTS.T35026A9906081.en. Retrieved 18 December 2017.
